description: Jay Matete scores twice in the second half as Bolton shrug off a sluggish start to beat 10-man Lincoln in League One.
title: Bolton Wanderers 3-0 Lincoln City
title_page: Bolton Wanderers 3-0 Lincoln City - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bolton Wanderers are unbeaten across their last six league games against Lincoln City, winning five of those in the process (D1), Across that run, the Trotters have also kept four clean sheets.
Lincoln City have failed to win any of their last five away league games against Bolton Wanderers (D1 L4), since a 2-0 victory in February 1984.
Bolton have won just one of their last six final league games of the year (D4 L1), though that sole victory did come in their last such match in 2023 during a 2-0 victory over Fleetwood Town.
After winning their final Football League game of the year for four consecutive years between 2017 and 2020, Lincoln have since failed to win any of their last three such matches (D1 L2).
